data.title: Local Modiin Attractions
data.meta_description: Attractions, entertainment and fun days out for kids and all the family in the Modiin area!
data.text:
Zirat HaLaser - Laser Modiin

City Center (Ma'ar)

כשר

City Center (Ma'ar)

Designed karaoke rooms with all the musical genres you are in the mood to sing! For groups of 2-30 people, including food and drink. Suitable for a wide variety of events: birthdays for kids or any age, work team building activities, Bat/Ba

Prachim

Kfar Chashmonai - Reconstruction of Daily Life in Ancient Times

18

Shilat

Range of interactive and fun activities for children and adults, portraying daily life in the land of Israel in ancient times, including a guided tour of the sites of the reconstructed village. Suitable for families, birthday parties, schoo

10% Off All Activities!

Modiin City Center Water Spray Fountains

City Center (Ma'ar)

2 areas of colorful water fountains, located side by side on the pedestrian promenade in the city center, opposite the Gray club. The fountains offer a play attraction for children, and a spectacular display of colored light and water after

My Ninja - Challenge Sports Center

City Center (Ma'ar)

For info re: the summer camp for ages 6-14 - click here! A social, challenging, competitive and professional sports center for fitness and ninja training for participants of any age and at any level, also for children with special needs. S

30% Off Month of September for Ninja Chugim!

Neot Kedumim - Attraction in Nature for the Whole Family

22

Ben Shemen

For info on upcoming events - click here! The only Biblical landscape reserve in the world, located halfway between Jerusalem and Tel Aviv. This unique recreation of the physical setting of the Bible in all its depth and detail allows visi

Performance Rock Modiin - Climbing Wall

City Center (Ma'ar)

Bouldering complex with over 100 climbing routes updated on a weekly basis, suitable for ages 4 and up, and for all levels. Bouldering is a branch within the world of climbing that is carried out on "low" walls (up to 4.5 m). Bouldering is

1

5

Ginaton

Extracting a smile from wood! Master workshop and gallery, where blocks and logs of wood are transformed into dolls and playground equipment full of charm and humor. You are invited to enter Saba Moti's rich world, experience and see how wo

Al Chavalim - Nature & Challenge Activities

6

Buchman (Shvatim & Moriah)

Specializing in unique nature and challenge activities for fun and team building days, Bar/Bat Mitzvahs, and birthdays, as well as attractions for a variety of events - for private, business and institutional customers. The activities take

10% Off Challenge Outdoor Tiyulim for Events!

Anava Park & Water Spray Park [Free]

38

Anava Park

For info re: boating options - click here! The spray park operates on the hour, every hour, for 30 minutes - during the following times: Sun-Thu: 15:00-18:00. Fri: 12:00-18:00. Sat: 10:00-18:00. Modiin-Maccabim-Reut’s municipal nature park

Artesana Glass - Hot Glass Workshops

11

Mevo Choron

Interactive and fun workshop for making decorative and useful glassware. Suitable as a family activity, get-together for friends, birthday workshop, Bat Mitzvah, company day out, mother and daughter workshop, and for anyone who wants to enj

5% Off Glass Workshop!

Boating at Anava Park - Summer 2024

Anava Park

Pedal boats for hire, up to 8 people per boat. The 2024 summer season will continue until 31/8/24. (See prices at the bottom of the page under 'Hours'). Boating takes place on the large lake at the center of Park Anava in Modiin. The boardi

Falcon - Laser Tag Extreme

Mishmar David

Largest laser tag arena in Israel. Now in a new, improved and upgraded location in the Engineering Corps museum - only 7 minutes drive away from Latrun. Offering innovative and upgraded activities created for you with lots of thought, time

Hasmonean Heritage Museum of Modiin

City Center (Ma'ar)

For info on upcoming events during the Summer vacation - click here! Museum presenting the story of the city of Modiin, from the days of the Hasmoneans, throughout history, up to the days of the establishment of the modern city, with a mul

Iza Pziza - Meshek Tzaban

11

מהדרין‎

Tal Shachar

Inviting you, with love, for a short break from the situation, in a warm and pleasant environment, with the goats, a cheese meal, coffee, bread and salad, and on Tuesdays and Fridays also Yonatan's delicious hummus. Also available daily for

Altman Farm - 'Pick Your Own' Orchard

4

Gimzo

Altman Farm in Moshav Gimzo opens its gates to the general public of all ages. An exciting family or social experience - with an old-time flavor on an active farm. Connecting to the love of the land and working the land. In the citrus seaso

Baking Workshop with Batsheva Pines

Buchman (Shvatim & Moriah)

Variety of interactive and tasty baking workshops for Bat Mitzvah girls, mothers and daughters (up to 4 mothers and 4 daughters per group), young couples, family events, friend meetups, or any other social event! Learn different baking tech

HaMakom Shel Tadmor - Craft Workshops

Dimri Towers

Experiential workshops at studio filled with creativity and inspiration! Workshops are divided by subject, level and age (children, youth and women). One-time or ongoing workshops, taught by artists and professionals in various fields, so t

Hava VeAdam - Ecological Farm

21

Ligad / The Technological Park

A farm that focuses on environmental and social education, and is located near Modiin. The farm functions as a platform enabling personal growth and contemplation on the deep connection between man and his natural environment. The farm's go

Nesher - Visitors center

Ramla

Guided tour of the famous cement factory, founded in 1925. The visitor's center presents the company, its enterprises, and its production facilities, in the past and present through images, explanations, an audio-visual installation and an

Skate Park Modiin - Extreme Park

22

Buchman (Shvatim & Moriah)

Israel's biggest extreme park. The 2,600 sqm park is mainly used by skateboarders and scooter rides, and some BMX bikers (who can also use the adjacent, more suitable, bike park). Entrance is free, with adjacent parking for around 80 cars.

9

Lev HaEmek

Teva HaShokolad - Healthy Chocolate Products & Chocolate Workshops

Mevo Choron

New! Group workshops during the summer vacation every Monday and Wednesday, allowing you to participate for a lower price, usually only offered for large groups! [phone] For more information call now: 053-3525108 Vegan and healthy fine choc

5% Off Healthy Vegan Chocolate & Chocolate Workshops!

The Water and Sport Park of Modiin Macabbim Reut

Ligad / The Technological Park

The summer season and opening of the outdoor swimming pools and water slides will start on 19/5/24. Complex containing 3 areas: covered pool, gym, and outdoor park with children's pools and slides. Entrance to each of the areas is by separ

Yad LaShiryon - Armored Forces Museum Latrun

5

Latrun

The museum presents its visitors with the magnificent heritage of the armored forces since the founding of the State of Israel. The museum also houses an international exhibition with over 160 models of tanks and other armored vehicles from

Aladdin - Agricultural Farm

40

Kfar Rut

Closed until further notice. Activities for children, and an option to produce your own olive oil! Olive harvest - variety of activities for children in the heart of the olive grove. Family activities on the farm: Feeding chickens Picking h

Bareket Observatory

19

Maccabim

Welcoming people who are interested in astronomy and want to see and learn about the skies and space scientifically, with a lot of enjoyment. The observatory is the largest and most sophisticated in the area, with special equipment. It is c

Chava BaGiv'ah Children's Farm

10

Givat Brenner

The farm at Kibbutz Givat Brenner was founded in the early 1950's as an educational farm for the kibbutz children. Today, the farm is open to visitors and offers activities that reflect the place's character as a children's farm.

Clore Garden of Science - Weizmann Institute

12

Rehovot

An interactive, outdoor science museum located in the heart of the Weizmann Institute of Science. The museum challenges visitors to enhance their understanding of the world around them with nearly 80 hands-on exhibits, which come to life on
